text: Night People is a 1954 American drama movie directed by Nunnally Johnson. It stars Gregory Peck, Broderick Crawford, Anita Bjork, Buddy Ebsen, and Walter Abel. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1955. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 drama movies Category:American drama movies
title: Night People (1954 movie)
